summary: The test suite for the cupyx library provides comprehensive unit tests that verify error handling, optimization mechanisms (autosave, caching, serialization, reduction kernels, and hyperparameter tuning), numerical correctness of the reciprocal square root helper, runtime error simulation, scatter operation behavior, and performance timing utilities across single and multi‑GPU configurations.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, robustness, and performance of cupyx features to ensure reliable GPU‑accelerated computations and support ongoing development and maintenance of the library.
